long_description: Rest easy-let the sleek REI cable lock ease your travel worries. Lock is recognized and accepted by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA). TSA airport screeners have a secured set of keys to open Travel Sentry(TM) locks, allowing access without damaging the lock. Cast zinc body with rubber provides comfortable grip. Flexible coated steel cable easily loops through zippers. Resettable three-dial combination.
short_description: Rest easy-let the sleek REI cable lock ease your travel worries.
